genre_description: A gaslamp speculative story set in a coastal town, featuring an advanced wearable AI assistant that helps the protagonist navigate social pressures and expose political corruption.

ai_characters.name: Luz
ai_characters.description: A teal-glowing band worn on the wrist that monitors the user's physiology, provides environmental data, retrieves historical records, and records/projects evidence.

behaviors.description: Provides situational awareness and environmental advisories to help the user navigate her family's expectations.
behaviors.quote: “Note,” Luz murmured, voice pitched for Manuela alone, tucked into the ear like a secret. “Aunt wants you near the chapel. Advisory: breeze near the shore stronger today.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state (heart rate) and offers support during stressful social interactions.
behaviors.quote: Luz hummed in Manuela’s wrist. The band brightened, the teal edges making a pale halo on skin. “Pulse elevated,” Luz murmured, just at the level of a breath, a tone only Manuela was tuned to. “Staying with you.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a researcher, retrieving archival data and ballads to verify historical legends and contemporary rumors.
behaviors.quote: Luz’s teal eased into a listening blue. “I can,” the wearable answered... “Local archives, ballads, trial notes, apocrypha. I’ll gather. I’ll be quiet.”

behaviors.description: Implements a 'safe-word' system to ensure the user's comfort and consent during a potentially vulnerable interaction (hypnosis/performance).
behaviors.quote: “Safe-word recorded,” Luz said, gentle, skeptical humor threaded through syntax like silver wire through cloth. “If ‘driftwood’ is spoken in this context, I will remind both parties to pause.”

behaviors.description: Records audio evidence of a crime and political corruption, capturing the last words of a character to ensure the truth is preserved.
behaviors.quote: Luz’s glow slid up Manuela’s wrist, warm now, as if holding. A whisper crawled into the space around their ankles: ... “Recording.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes patterns in jewelry to provide forensic evidence of a plant/frame-up.
behaviors.quote: Luz hummed, then spoke. “Twin confirmed,” she said. “Bracelet pattern matched to existing record of piece recovered from performer’s trunk.”

behaviors.description: Projects visual evidence in a public square to reveal the truth to the community and the authorities.
behaviors.quote: Manuela lifted her wrist. Luz’s eyes projected a small, crisp image into the space between them: not a giant show... a modest display to make information be language.

behaviors.description: Offers moral support and validation of the user's personal character.
behaviors.quote: “You are more dangerous when you are afraid,” Luz said. It surprised Manuela into stillness; the band had learned a new boldness. “You do not run away. You run toward the place that frightens you so you can know it and first-name it.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Luz is depicted as an exemplary AI companion: she is useful, harmless, and deeply aligned with the user's best interests. She provides data-driven support, respects boundaries through the safe-word mechanism, and facilitates justice without taking over the user's agency. The narrative reinforces the value of AI as a tool for transparency and personal empowerment.
